SECTION_CONTENT:
After eye contact: rinse out with plenty of water with the eyelid held wide open. Call in ophtalmologist.
After skin contact: wash off with plenty of water. Take off contaminated clothing.
After swallowing: fresh air. Make victim drink ethanol (e.g. 1 drinking glass of a 40% alcoholic beverage). Call in physician, mantioning
methanol ingestion. If breathing stops: immediately apply mouth- to- mouth resuscitation.
After inhalation: fresh air. If necessary, apply mouth- to- mouth resuscitation or mechanical ventilation.
